languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, тревога! Множественные аварии критических систем по всему кораблю, связь с половиной отсеков утеряна, судно разве что на куски не разваливается! Мы срочно ожидаем Вашу Светлость на мостике".

"Lord Captain! Multiple critical systems are failing throughout the vessel, half the compartments are no longer responding — the ship is falling apart! We request Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s presence on the bridge immediately."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, тревога! Множественные аварии критических систем по всему кораблю, связь с половиной отсеков утеряна, судно разве что на куски не разваливается! Мы срочно ожидаем Вашу Светлость на мостике".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, alarm! Multiple critical systems are failing throughout the vessel, half the compartments no longer respond, and the ship is almost falling apart! We expect Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} on the bridge immediately."

"Lord Captain, alarm! Multiple critical systems are failing throughout the vessel, half the compartments no longer respond, and the ship is almost falling apart! We expect Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} on the bridge immediately."

"Lord Captain, alarm! Multiple critical systems are failing throughout the vessel, half the compartments are no longer responding, and the ship is falling apart! We request Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s presence on the bridge immediately."

"Lord Captain, alarm! Multiple critical systems are failing throughout the vessel, half the compartments are no longer responding, and the ship is falling apart! We request Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s presence on the bridge immediately."

"Lord Captain! Multiple critical systems are failing throughout the vessel, half the compartments are no longer responding — the ship is falling apart! We request Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s presence on the bridge immediately."

"Lord Captain! Multiple critical systems are failing throughout the vessel, half the compartments are no longer responding — the ship is falling apart! We request Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s presence on the bridge immediately."

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán! Están fallando sistemas críticos por toda la nave, la mitad de los compartimentos no responden... ¡la nave se cae a pedazos! Solicitamos la presencia de mi{mf|lord|lady} en el puente de inmediato».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Multiple critical systems are failing throughout the vessel, half the compartments are no longer responding — the ship is falling apart! We request Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s presence on the bridge immediately."

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán! Están fallando sistemas críticos por toda la nave, la mitad de los compartimentos no responden... ¡la nave se cae a pedazos! Solicitamos la presencia de mi{mf|lord|lady} en el puente de inmediato».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン！複数の重要システムが船のあちこちで故障しており、区画の半分から応答がありません…船は崩壊寸前です！陛下、至急ブリッジまでお越しください」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Multiple critical systems are failing throughout the vessel, half the compartments are no longer responding — the ship is falling apart! We request Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s presence on the bridge immediately."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン！複数の重要システムが船のあちこちで故障しており、区画の半分から応答がありません…船は崩壊寸前です！陛下、至急ブリッジまでお越しください」

languages.text: “舰长大人！整艘船的多个关键系统都发生了故障，一半的舱室都失去了响应！整艘船正在分崩离析！我们请求您立刻前往舰桥，大人。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Multiple critical systems are failing throughout the vessel, half the compartments are no longer responding — the ship is falling apart! We request Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s presence on the bridge immediately."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人！整艘船的多个关键系统都发生了故障，一半的舱室都失去了响应！整艘船正在分崩离析！我们请求您立刻前往舰桥，大人。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain! Mehrere kritische Systeme im gesamten Schiff versagen, die Hälfte der Module reagieren nicht mehr — das Schiff fällt auseinander! Wir erbitten die sofortige Anwesenheit Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} auf der Brücke."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Multiple critical systems are failing throughout the vessel, half the compartments are no longer responding — the ship is falling apart! We request Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s presence on the bridge immediately."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain! Mehrere kritische Systeme im gesamten Schiff versagen, die Hälfte der Module reagieren nicht mehr — das Schiff fällt auseinander! Wir erbitten die sofortige Anwesenheit Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} auf der Brücke."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Plusieurs systèmes essentiels tombent en panne les uns après les autres, la moitié des compartiments ne répondent plus... Le vaisseau tombe en ruines ! La présence de Votre Seigneurie est requise sur le pont dans les plus brefs délais. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Multiple critical systems are failing throughout the vessel, half the compartments are no longer responding — the ship is falling apart! We request Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s presence on the bridge immediately."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Plusieurs systèmes essentiels tombent en panne les uns après les autres, la moitié des compartiments ne répondent plus... Le vaisseau tombe en ruines ! La présence de Votre Seigneurie est requise sur le pont dans les plus brefs délais. »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan! Tüm gemide kritik önem taşıyan birçok sistemde arıza yaşanıyor. Kompartımanlardan yarısından yanıt alamıyoruz. Gemi parçalanıyor! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bir an önce köprüde bize katılmanızı rica ediyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! Multiple critical systems are failing throughout the vessel, half the compartments are no longer responding — the ship is falling apart! We request Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s presence on the bridge immediately."
